div.p: This work was supported by the European Union’s PREFACE (FP7/2007–2013, no. 603521) project and the SPACES/SACCUS (No. 03G0837A) and RACE II (Grant Agreement No. 03F0729C) and InterDec (Grant Agreement No. 01LP1609B) projects of the BMBF, as well as the Australian Research Council, the Earth Systems and Climate Change Hub of the Australian Government’s National Environmental Science Program (NESP), and Centre for Southern Hemisphere Oceans Research (CSHOR), a joint research centre between QNLM and CSIRO. We also acknowledge the Integrated School of Ocean Sciences (ISOS; Kiel, Germany) for their support in carrying out the project in the exchange program between the University of Kiel, Germany and the University of New South Wales, Sydney, Australia. We thank Smaeyl Hassanzadeh, Edmund Meredith, Evan Anita, Nina Bergmann, Tania Chiarini, and Shubham Srivastava who helped to write and manage the proposal of the current study. We acknowledge the CESM Large Ensemble Community Project and supercomputing resources provided by NSF/CISL/Yellowstone, and the assistance of resources and services from the National Computational Infrastructure (NCI), which is supported by the Australian Government.
